relheader

The <relheader> element is a row of column definitions (<relcolspec> elements) in a relationship table. Each table can have only one set of column definitions.

Contains

(relcolspec) (one or more)

Contained by

reltable

Inheritance

map/relheader

Attributes

Name Description Data Type Default Value Required?
%global-atts; (xtrf, xtrc) A set of related attributes, described at global-atts parameter entity PE not applicable Not applicable
class A common attribute described in othercommon

Example

See reltable.
